about_the_game:
This is the official digital adaptation of the MagnyTour board game.

You'll take the role of a team manager and guide your team of 3 runners trough a series of grueling races that wind their way through mountains, plains and time trials.

In this turn-based game, every action must be carefully considered for each of your three specialized racers (climber, sprinter, and all-rounder):

=> Roll the dice to set your pace and risk encountering technical problems


=> Take advantage of the slipstream created by other racers to follow them


=> Strategically wait to slow down the racers behind you and create a gap


=> Seize an opportunity to attack and break away from the peloton



The game offers several options for guiding your racers, and each racer has their own strengths and weaknesses. As a manager, you will need to take these differences into account and choose your strategy accordingly.
MagnyTour offers a strategy and tactics-rich gaming experience for fans of cycling and simulation games.

Features:

* Choose between "classic" one-day race, Tour or time trial
* Solo mode against AI
* Online multiplayer mode with up-to 6 players
